resources.string: Enter the number of people splitting this bill.
Check out \'Tally Up\'…\nit\'s a tip calculator and a bill splitting utility. It makes calculating the tip and dividing up the bill among a group easier than ever.
Please consider rating \'Tally Up\' and possibly providing feedback?\n\nBy giving constructive feedback you help create the best possible experience for all users.

To start using 'Tally Up' tip calculator and bill splitting utility simply enter the total bill amount and then either choose a percentage for the tip or choose a specific amount to tip.

Once the tip is decided on, you can choose if the bill is going to be split amount a group. If so, then select the 'Split Bill' option and enter the number of people that will be splitting the check.

After the bill has been calculated, you can then text a detailed copy of the bill to all parties paying.
The total amount of the bill including tax.
Can be either a percentage of the total bill or a specified amount.
Choose if the bill is being split with others and how many people are splitting it.
If the bill is being split with others, this shows how much each person should pay.
This shows the total bill including tax and tip that can be divided up among multiple people.
